## Packages

**Tidyverse** 

[httr](https://github.com/r-lib/httr) for web APIs.  

[rvest](https://github.com/tidyverse/rvest) for scraping information from web pages.  

<br />

**Data Collection**

[rtweet](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rtweet/vignettes/intro.html) for accessing Twitter's REST and stream APIs.  

[jsonlite](https://github.com/jeroen/jsonlite) for reading JSON data.  

<br />

**Natural Language Processing**

[tidytext](https://www.tidytextmining.com/index.html) implementing tidy principles of Hadley Wickham to text mining.

[tm](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/tm/index.html) a comprehensive text mining framework for R. 

[quanteda](https://github.com/quanteda/quanteda) R functions for Quantitative Analysis of Textual Data.  

<br />

**Reproducible Research**

[rmarkdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/) dynamic documents for R.

[knitr](https://github.com/yihui/knitr) dynamic report generation in R.

[slidify](https://github.com/ramnathv/slidify) create reproducible html5 slides from R markdown.
